title: 大神求教！！安装Forge后出现这种情况该怎么办？？
author: 硫酸铝钾

replies.author: xpen
replies.txt_content: 国外的东西需要番羽土啬才能下载的。

replies.author: i板凳
replies.txt_content:
自行下载版本对应文件试一试
http://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/versions/xxx版本/xxx版本.jar
http://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/versions/xxx版本/xxx版本.jar

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 推荐HMCL启动器，安装forge比BN稳定一些
